about: 4TH.PYRAMID Company for design and engineering consultancy, based in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, has designed many structures, buildings, and bridges and supervised them. They are distributed throughout Egypt, the Arabian Gulf region, and Africa. Our ambition to innovate systems has enhanced Saudi Arabia's reputation for achieving remarkable feats in structural engineering. For 20 years, we have continued to complete economic and superior designs. We ensure that our structural engineers work closely with clients and collaborators and stay informed so they can innovate in response to challenges and constraints. Areas of expertise (structural design and supervision) 1- Traditional buildings. 2- Bridges. 3- Tunnels. 4- Factories. 5- Hospitals. Building materials: 1- Reinforced concrete. 2- Prestressed concrete. 3- Structural steel. 4- Wall bearing systems. Additionally, Saudi Arabia has designed to repair and strengthen many structures. The systems used are concrete casing, steel cladding, and FRP wrapping and strengthening. We work with architects, civil engineers, and owners to achieve architectural requirements in the best possible way and at the lowest cost.
